meta_desc: Apartment Olive — bright duplex with private pool, terrace with garden and sea view, BBQ, fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning in all rooms, and private parking in Lovran near Opatija.
intro: Sunny duplex with private pool, terrace, garden, and sea view.
title: Olive Apartment
description:
Apartment Olive offers a bright and spacious retreat in a quiet part of Lovran, just 10 minutes from the town center and the famous Lungomare promenade. With a sunny terrace and private pool overlooking Kvarner Bay, it provides modern comfort, plenty of natural light, and accommodation for up to 6 guests."
Located only 100 meters from the beach and equipped with a BBQ area and private parking, Olive is perfect for both relaxing holidays and remote work by the sea.
features: 🌅 Terrace with garden and sea view
